```{r}
library(readr)
co2_data <- read_csv("C:/Users/VINH/Desktop/Spacial&temporal/dataset/dirty/co2_mm_gl.csv", skip = 51, col_names = c("Year", "Month", "CO2_Adjusted", "Uncertainty_Adj", "CO2_Raw", "Uncertainty_Raw"))
co2_data <- co2_data[, c("Year", "Month", "CO2_Raw")]
co2_filtered <- subset(co2_data, Year >= 2000 & Year <= 2010)
write_csv(co2_filtered, "co2_2000_2010.csv")
anomaly_data <- read_csv("C:/Users/VINH/Desktop/Spacial&temporal/dataset/dirty/data.csv", skip = 5, col_names = c("Date", "Anomaly"))
anomaly_data$Year <- as.integer(substr(anomaly_data$Date, 1, 4))
anomaly_data$Month <- as.integer(substr(anomaly_data$Date, 5, 6))
anomaly_data <- anomaly_data[, c("Year", "Month", "Anomaly")]
anomaly_filtered <- subset(anomaly_data, Year >= 2000 & Year <= 2010)
write_csv(anomaly_filtered, "anomaly_2000_2010.csv")
print("Both datasets have been cleaned and saved successfully!")
```
